department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Acquisition of a printed circuit board manufacturing system
description: The Canadian Space Agency is acquiring a printed circuit board manufacturing system including a training on the operation on the device located in St-Hubert (Québec), as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
### Opportunities for Electronic Manufacturing and Processing Machinery
#### RFP: Printed Circuit Board Manufacturing System
Table of Contents
-----------------

* [Introduction](#introduction)
* [Procurement Details](#procurement-details)
* [Reminders](#reminders)

### Introduction
------------

The Government of Canada, represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the procurement of a printed circuit board manufacturing system.

### Procurement Details
-----------------------

* **Contract Number**:  WS4328777458-Doc4328969568
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **UNSpsc Code**: 23211100 (Electronic manufacturing and processing machinery)
* **Bid Closing Date**: January 11, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Time
* **Contract Start Date**: January 9, 2024, and end on April 9, 2024
* **Regions of Delivery**: Québec
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Reminders
------------

* This procurement has expired and is no longer active.
* Please review all terms and conditions, as well as the Statement of Requirements, before submitting a proposal.

#### Contact Information
----------------------

* **Contact Person**: Melanie Caty
* **Email**: melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18143169?extsite=MTgxNDMxNjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
